parameters.party:
Political party chosen - a factor.  Levels are
conservative, labour, Lib/SDP/Alliance,
others, and none.
parameters.numpos:
An ordered factor giving the number of positive answers to
seven questions.
parameters.religion:
Religion - a factor.  Levels are Roman
	Catholic, Protestant/Church of England, others,
and none.
parameters.class:
Self assessed social class - a factor.  Levels are
middle, upper working, and lower working.

reference:
These data are provided as an example of multilevel data with a 
multinomial response.
description:
Description
These data come from the British Social Attitudes (BSA) Survey started
in 1983. The eligible persons were all adults aged 18 or over living
in private households in Britain.  The data consist of completed
results of 264 respondents out of 410.
title: Social Attitudes Survey
format: A data frame with 1056 observations on the following 9 variables.
